subject: Thanks, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your your credit report does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$204,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this plain form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://duplejkxiformrx.com/
